original_text: Also on the tenth day of this seventh month there shall be a day of atonement: it shall be an holy convocation unto you; and ye shall afflict your souls, and offer an offering made by fire unto the Lord.
korean_text: 일곱째 달 열흘날은 속죄일이니 너희는 성회를 열고 스스로 괴롭게 하며 여호와께 화제를 드리고

sentences.original_text: Also on the tenth day of this seventh month
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 이 일곱째 달의 열흘째 날에

sentences.original_text: there shall be a day of atonement:
it shall be an holy convocation unto you;
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희를 위한 거룩한 모임이 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and ye shall afflict your souls,
and offer an offering made by fire unto the Lord.
